name: Trick or Treat - Clown Hell
description:
Game made for Japari Park Game Jam.

Controls: WASD for movement, Spacebar for jump. Holding jump button longer extends your jump!

Program used: Stencyl

Team:
Snake - music

Leo - character art and animations

Flare - tilesets, background art, programming

Welcome to clown hell :^) Don't fall off the edges of the map, you'll have to restart!
